p: Figure 5 shows the best reduction in the target lesion size from the baseline. Tumor shrinkage in the IRI group was better compared with the OX group in aCRCS A1 + B1 (Figure 5A), while it was better in the OX group compared with the IRI group in aCRCS B2 (Figure 5C). All patients in the OX group showed a reduction in the target lesion size in aCRCS B2. The trend in tumor shrinkage was similar between the OX and IRI groups in aCRCS A2 (Figure 5B). Best overall response was shown in Table S3.
